title: Stock Car Driver Robbie Brewer Dies at 53 After Medical Emergency During Race
snippet: Veteran stock car driver Robbie Brewer suffered a medical emergency while competing in a race at the Bowman Gray Stadium in Winston-Salem on Saturday night and crashed into a wall, according to the Associated Press and John Dell of the Winston-Salem Journal.

title: VC vs. RACE: Which Stock Is the Better Value Option?
snippet: Investors interested in Automotive - Original Equipment stocks are likely familiar with Visteon (VC) and Ferrari (RACE). But which of these two stocks is more attractive to value investors? We'll need to take a closer look to find out.

title: The Race to Launch Tokenized Stocks Is On. Here's What That Means for U.S. Investors
snippet: Trading platforms and crypto exchanges Robinhood, Kraken, and now Coinbase, are vying to plant their flag in tokenization.

title: VC or RACE: Which Is the Better Value Stock Right Now?
snippet: The P/B ratio is used to compare a stock's market value with its book value, which is defined as total assets minus total liabilities. For comparison, RACE has a P/B of 33.32.
